mean_cn: n.【化学】酸；酸性物质；尖酸；  adj.酸的
mean_en: a chemical, usually a liquid, that contains hydrogen and has a pH of less than seven. The hydrogen can be replaced by a metal to form a salt. Acids are usually sour and can often burn holes in or damage things they touch.
sentence: Don't touch the acid—it will burn your skin.
sentence_trans: 千万不要去碰酸，它会灼伤你的皮肤。
